definitions.definition: In a state of subordination, submission or defeat.
examples: The army could not keep the people under .

definitions.definition: Under anesthesia , especially general anesthesia ; sedated .
examples: Ensure the patient is sufficiently under .

definitions.definition: Having a particular property that is low, especially so as to be insufficient or lacking in a particular respect.

secondary_definitions: In a state of subordination, submission or defeat.
( medicine , colloquial ) Under anesthesia , especially general anesthesia ; sedated .
( informal ) Having a particular property that is low, especially so as to be insufficient or lacking in a particular respect.
